attributes.action: Allow EU citizens residing in the UK long term to vote on a Brexit referendum.
attributes.additional_details: If Commonwealth Citizens in the UK were allowed to vote without any residency time restrictions, EU citizens residing in the UK long term should have a say.
attributes.background: EU citizens residing in the UK for over 5 years are entitled to permanent residence status. As part of the democratic process they should have a say on what is happening to UK's membership to the EU.
